text: A thermal power station is a power station in which heat energy is converted to electric power. A thermal power station may be referred to as any of the following types: * List of biomass power stations * List of coal power stations * List of fuel oil power stations * List of geothermal power stations * List of natural gas power stations * List of nuclear power stations * List of solar thermal power stations == See also == * List of thermal power station failures
title: List of thermal power stations
